I'm sorry, but I am closing thi, since it is not a TensorFlow question, this is a machine learning algorithm question. Please read references on what batch size means, e.g. here is one of the first google results.
https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/153531/what-is-batch-size-in-neural-network

Best of luck. Thanks!
